docs.snippet: Maccabi Tel Aviv reached the Euroleague Final Four after an 86-66 home win over Emporio Armani Milan completed a 3-1 victory in their best-of-five quarterfinal series....
docs.lead_paragraph: Maccabi Tel Aviv reached the Euroleague Final Four after an 86-66 home win over Emporio Armani Milan completed a 3-1 victory in their best-of-five quarterfinal series.
docs.abstract: Maccabi Tel Aviv basketball club defeats Emporio Armani Milan, 86-66, to advance to the Euroleague Final Four.

headline.main: Tel Aviv in Euroleague Final Four
headline.print_headline: Tel Aviv in Euroleague Final Four

docs.snippet: Mike Miller was with the Grizzlies for three unproductive playoff appearances starting in 2003, then went to Miami for three seasons before returning to Memphis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Miller was with the Grizzlies for three unproductive playoff appearances starting in 2003, then went to Miami for three seasons before returning to Memphis.
docs.abstract: Memphis Grizzlies forward Mike Miller, coming off back-to-back championships with Miami Heat, is determined to help the Grizzlies win a championship; Miller played for Memphis from 2003 to 2008, period in which team made three straight playoff appearances but were incapable of winning even a game.

headline.main: Miller Hopes to Bring a Bit of Miami Back to Memphis
headline.print_headline: Hoping to Bring a Bit of Miami to Memphis

docs.snippet: Phil Jackson, the team president, left little doubt on Wednesday that Steve Kerr was his top choice as coach and made a case for players sacrificing financially to upgrade the roster....
docs.lead_paragraph: Phil Jackson, the team president, left little doubt on Wednesday that Steve Kerr was his top choice as coach and made a case for players sacrificing financially to upgrade the roster.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column; New York Knicks president Phil Jackson leaves little doubt that Steve Kerr is his top choice as coach and makes case for players sacrificing financially to upgrade the roster; forward Carmelo Anthony has said that he would be amendable to earning less to stay with the Knicks.

docs.snippet: Despite being tied, 1-1, in their playoff series against the Raptors, the Nets have done much to dictate the play, mostly with their defense....
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite being tied, 1-1, in their playoff series against the Raptors, the Nets have done much to dictate the play, mostly with their defense.
docs.abstract: Off The Dribble blog; Brooklyn Nets, tied 1-1 in their playoff series with Toronto Raptors, are dictating play, mostly with their defense, forcing the Raptors to make adjustments and rely on their slowest guard Greivis Vasquez.

headline.main: Nets Dictating Play as the Raptors Rely on a Backup
headline.print_headline: Nets Dictating Play as the Raptors Rely on a Backup

docs.lead_paragraph: A prestigious international school in Indonesia said Thursday it was cooperating with police in their investigation of alleged abuse of a 6-year-old student and was devastated upon learning of allegations against an American teacher who worked there for a decade.

headline.main: Indonesian School: We'll Cooperate in Abuse Probe
